about_the_game:
The “Map Pack 2” DLC can be purchased to gain 9 new Maps to play!
It contains Map 13a-13h and 14.
There are new addditional settings to choose a map (depending on the game modus):
  • Choose a map from a random group of maps in-game
  • Assign a map to each player in your group in the matchmaker
  • Or let everyone choose freely which map they want to play in-game

Owning the base game of Castles of Burgundy is needed to play.
detailed_description:
The “Map Pack 2” DLC can be purchased to gain 9 new Maps to play!
It contains Map 13a-13h and 14.
There are new addditional settings to choose a map (depending on the game modus):
  • Choose a map from a random group of maps in-game
  • Assign a map to each player in your group in the matchmaker
  • Or let everyone choose freely which map they want to play in-game

Owning the base game of Castles of Burgundy is needed to play.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+, SteamOS+
  • Processor: 1 Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Shader model 3.0
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.8+
  • Processor: 1 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Shader model 3.0
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
